actions.name: Diamond Storm
actions.description: Effect: After this attack resolves, the user has a 33% chance of raising their DEF Stage by +1 for 8 activations.

actions.name: Diamond Storm (Misty)
actions.description:
The user is affected by Misty Terrain.

Effect: After this attack resolves, the user has a 33% chance of raising their DEF Stage by +1 for 8 activations.

actions.name: Diamond Domain
actions.description: While affected by Misty Terrain, the user's Diamond Storm also causes the user to have a 33% chance of raising their SPDEF Stage by +1 for 8 Activations, and the user and their allies possess the Ability Clear Body. The user and all allies within Range are always under the effects of Misty Terrain.

system.description:
Trigger: The user is affected by Misty Terrain and declares Diamond Storm.

Effect: Connection - Diamond Storm. The user can choose to use Diamond Storm at a Range of "6m Cone" until the end of their Activation.

Passive: While affected by Misty Terrain, the user's Diamond Storm also causes the user to have a 33% chance of raising their SPDEF Stage by +1 for 8 Activations, and the user and their allies possess the Ability Clear Body. The user and all allies within Range are always under the effects of Misty Terrain.
